Ingredients.4: 1 (3 pound) boneless top loin pork roast

Directions.1: Combine oil, pepper, and salt in a bowl; rub oil mixture over pork and refrigerate while the oven preheats.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).

Directions.3: Place pork on a roasting rack set in a large roasting pan. Roast in the preheated oven for 30 minutes.

Directions.4: Remove pork from the oven and reduce the heat to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Insert an instant-read thermometer into the thickest part of the center. The temperature will range from 80 to 110 degrees F (27 to 43 degrees C).

Directions.5: Allow pork to rest uncovered at room temperature until the internal temperature reaches between 115 and 140 degrees F (46 and 60 degrees C), about 30 minutes.

Directions.6: Return to oven and continue to cook until internal temperature reaches 145 degrees F (63 degrees C), 15 to 30 minutes more.

Directions.7: Let the roast stand uncovered at room temperature for 15 to 20 minutes before slicing and serving.
